page.title: 16MONTACUTE TODAY
page.content:
The drive is magnificently long & has not been used in many years.This year ,though it has been used for the carnival procession. This is far different from the days when horses used to pull carriages grandly up the drive. Montacute is situated on the main road A3088.Nowadays the village is much more quieter as the new section of the A3088 is used much more than the old road. My friends are over in the recreation ground on the BMX track having glorious fun, jumping and falling off,practising & showing off. Some of my other friends are playing football trying to improve their skills in order to become future stars
{MORE>
